job_description: Senior Analyst Accounting Intercompany Join us as a Senior Analyst on our Intercompany accounting team in Bucharest to do the best work of your career and make a profound social impact. What you’ll achieve As a Senior Analyst you will be responsible for preparing, analyzing, and reviewing aging on the IC transactions along with supporting monthly IC accounts reconciliation process. You will coordinate with various functions (tax, legal, finance, sales, services) to ensure compliance with relevant policies and regulations. Key responsibilities: Timely and accurate closing of the books in line with set deadlines Provides support and expert guidance to business partners as required Bring new ideas for process improvement where possible Take the first step towards your dream career Every Dell Technologies team member brings something unique to the table. Here’s what we are looking for with this role: Essential Requirements A minimum of  3 years of working experience in Finance, of that at least 2 years in accounting. Professional English & well rounded communication skills Close attention to details Self starter who does not require daily oversight Strong Excel skills Who we are We believe that each of us has the power to make an impact. That’s why we put our team members at the center of everything we do. If you’re looking for an opportunity to grow your career with some of the best minds and most advanced tech in the industry, we’re looking for you. Dell Technologies is a unique family of businesses that helps individuals and organizations transform how they work, live and play. Join us to build a future that works for everyone because Progress Takes All of Us.
